name: Summer camp
description: That camp provides hands-on projects and outdoor games for K-10th graders and acts as an opportunity to build creative problem solving and collaboration skills.
fullDescription: That camp provides hands-on projects and outdoor games for K-10th graders and acts as an opportunity to build creative problem solving and collaboration skills.

cost: This is a fee-based service, scholarships are available
